associated_text.body: The rise in digital communications, and the ability to capture vast amounts of data, creates opportunities for businesses to gain new insights into customer behaviours and preferences and use them to achieve competitive advantage

associated_text.body: Customers are increasingly demanding and intolerant of delays (e.g. whether finding information on a website or waiting for delivery of an online order) and expecting personalised and customised experiences. They are willing to switch suppliers if they don’t get the response they expect.
